metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12987 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The IEEE 802.11 parser in tcpdump before 4.9.2 has a buffer over-read in print-802_11.c:parse_elements().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12987` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
